channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Tinder Decomposed Its iOS Monolith App Handling 70M Users】Tinder 如何分解其处理 7000 万用户的 iOS 整体应用程序
item.description: 【In Tinder’s case, deep inter-dependencies between those targets stretched what engineers call the critical path, which is the longest chain of dependent tasks that determines how long a build takes.】在 Tinder 的例子中，这些目标之间的深层相互依赖性延伸了工程师所说的关键路径，这是决定构建需要多长时间的最长的依赖任务链。

item.title: 【How Spotify Built Its Data Platform To Understand 1.4 Trillion Data Points】Spotify 如何构建其数据平台来理解 1.4 万亿个数据点
item.description: 【This evolution happened organically as Spotify’s products matured. With each new feature and business need, new data requirements emerged.】随着 Spotify 产品的成熟，这种演变自然发生。随着每一个新功能和业务需求的出现，新的数据需求也随之出现。

item.title: 【How Uber Built a Conversational AI Agent For Financial Analysis】Uber 如何构建用于财务分析的对话式人工智能代理
item.description: 【Finch is designed to bring financial intelligence directly into Slack, the communication platform already used by the company’s teams.】Finch 旨在将金融情报直接引入 Slack（该公司团队已经使用的通信平台）。

item.title: 【EP188: Servers You Should Know in Modern Systems】EP188：现代系统中您应该了解的服务器
item.description: 【Servers You Should Know in Modern Systems】现代系统中您应该了解的服务器

item.title: 【Last Chance to Enroll | Become an AI Engineer | Cohort 2】最后报名机会 |成为一名人工智能工程师 |第 2 组
item.description: 【After the incredible success of our first cohort, with nearly 500 participants, we’re thrilled to announce the launch of Cohort 2 of Become an AI Engineer!】在我们的第一个队列取得了令人难以置信的成功（拥有近 500 名参与者）之后，我们很高兴地宣布推出成为人工智能工程师的第二个队列！

item.title: 【Top Strategies to Share Data Between Services】在服务之间共享数据的最佳策略
item.description: 【In this article, we explore these questions in depth. We investigate the difference between sharing a data source and sharing data, and examine the main strategies used to share data between services.】在本文中，我们将深入探讨这些问题。我们研究了共享数据源和共享数据之间的区别，并研究了用于在服务之间共享数据的主要策略。

item.title: 【How Databricks Implemented Intelligent Kubernetes Load Balancing】Databricks 如何实现智能 Kubernetes 负载均衡
item.description: 【The Databricks Engineering Team needed something smarter: a Layer 7, request-level load balancer that could react dynamically to real service conditions instead of relying on connection-level routing decisions.】Databricks 工程团队需要更智能的东西：第 7 层请求级负载均衡器，它可以对实际服务条件做出动态反应，而不是依赖于连接级路由决策。

item.title: 【How Datadog Built a Custom Database to Ingest Billions of Metrics Per Second】Datadog 如何构建自定义数据库以每秒获取数十亿个指标
item.description: 【This article analyzes the technical decisions and clever optimizations behind the database.】本文分析了数据库背后的技术决策和巧妙的优化。

item.title: 【How Perplexity Built an AI Google】Perplexity 如何打造人工智能 Google
item.description: 【In a decisive move, Perplexity abandoned four months of work on their original project to focus entirely on the challenge of building a true answer engine for the web.】作为一个决定性的举措，Perplexity 放弃了四个月的原始项目工作，完全专注于为网络构建真正的答案引擎的挑战。

item.title: 【EP187: Why is DeepSeek-OCR such a BIG DEAL?】EP187：为什么 DeepSeek-OCR 如此重要？
item.description: 【Over to you: Which additional data structures have we overlooked?】轮到你了：我们忽略了哪些额外的数据结构？
